</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the value of "3D Performance" in OFP Preferences (flashpoint.cfg). ____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''benchmark''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>? (benchmark>2000) : setViewDistance 2000</inner><close></pre></close></ext> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[viewDistance]], [[setDetailMapBlendPars]], [[setTerrainGrid]], [[getObjectViewDistance]], [[setObjectViewDistance]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

<dt class="note>'''[[User:Killzone_Kid|Killzone_Kid]]'''
